data.lyric:
[ti:WAKA (Explicit)]
[ar:6IX9INE/A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie]
[al:DUMMY BOY (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]WAKA (Explicit) - 6ix9ine/A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie
[00:00.15]Catch an asthma attack the way we pull up on ya
[00:02.88]Put the pump to his chest make a n***a cough up
[00:05.03]You a bum and you stressed and that's why you lost her
[00:07.47]Met a n***a from the X n***as need to boss up
[00:09.99]She gon' eat you want beef but this ain't no burger
[00:12.38]All my songs on repeat that's what's up your word up
[00:14.93]I was young with the heat walkin' 'round with burners
[00:17.41]Wishin' I could wish for anything like Timmy Turner
[00:19.76]Turner turener turner
[00:21.79]Na na oh nah oh
[00:24.27]Na na oh nah oh
[00:26.64]Na na oh nah oh
[00:29.14]Why this b***h tryna play me
[00:30.54]Are you crazy
[00:31.56]Pocket rocket in my cargos like the navy
[00:33.99]Put this Tommy to his brain please like he vrady
[00:36.38]Heartbreakin' on the daily can you save me
[00:38.96]Why is b*****s tryna play me
[00:40.36]Are you crazy
[00:41.45]I can't let her have my baby you not my baby
[00:43.98]I can't let her have my baby I'm actin' shady
[00:46.37]Heartbreaking on the daily can you save me
[00:48.78]Y'all gotta move give me some room I'm 'bout to shoot
[00:51.98]Boom
[00:53.00]Everybody runnin' out the room
[00:54.62]Boom
[00:55.47]Everybody beggin'
[00:56.08]Don't shoot
[00:57.07]Boom n***a who the f**k asked you
[00:59.35]You a bum are you dumb
[01:00.54]Try me I got this gun
[01:01.83]Run n***a if I'm here don't come
[01:04.28]B***h you was expectin' for me to hit
[01:06.89]That's a dub I know you put a hole in that s**t
[01:09.18]Sawed off in the d**n drawer
[01:11.06]Got the 30 in my drawers gotta hold my pants up
[01:13.31]Only time she ever call is for the banana
[01:15.99]I don't even check my call log I don't answer
[01:18.40]Why this b***h tryna play me
[01:19.82]Are you crazy
[01:20.90]Pocket rocket in my cargos like the navy
[01:23.31]Put this Tommy to his brain please like he brady
[01:25.64]Heartbreakin' on the daily can you save me
[01:28.13]Why this b***h tryna play me
[01:29.67]Is she crazy
[01:30.76]That b***h know I'm number one like Tracy Mc Grady
[01:33.14]Know I got this 380 it's on safety
[01:35.59]I know all these n***as hate me won't let it faze me
[01:38.08]F**k n***a
[01:38.88]I'ma swerve in the Maybach I'ma do some damage
[01:41.14]N***as sit the f**k down if you don't understand us
[01:43.47]I heard n***as talkin' 'bout they gon' run down on us
[01:46.07]Pull up windows down in the f**kin' Lamb' truck
[01:48.47]Nnanannan
[01:51.12]Nnanannana
[01:53.67]Nnanannana
[01:56.05]Nnanannana
[01:56.76]Nnanannana yeah
data.trans:
[ti:WAKA (Explicit)]
[ar:6IX9INE/A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie]
[al:DUMMY BOY (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.15]等我们找上你 你肯定吓得喘不上气
[00:02.88]拿着压动式霰弹枪对准他的胸口 让这个小子交出财物
[00:05.03]你生活没保障 背负的东西太多 所以连女人都留不住
[00:07.47]遇到一个来自布朗克斯区的小子 你们还是得硬气一点
[00:09.99]她胃口不小 你想要挑事 这可不是吃个汉堡这么简单
[00:12.38]我的歌曲都很受欢迎 这是事实 你没意见吧
[00:14.93]年轻时期我就很火 自带流量
[00:17.41]我多想像Timmy Turner一样 许什么愿望都有人帮我实现
[00:19.76]//
[00:21.79]//
[00:24.27]//
[00:26.64]//
[00:29.14]你竟然敢戏弄我
[00:30.54]你疯了吗
[00:31.56]工装裤里揣着手枪 威力不亚于美国海军的导弹
[00:33.99]拿着汤普森冲锋枪对准他的脑袋 他只能跪地求饶
[00:36.38]天天都感觉心痛不已 你能不能救救我 
[00:38.96]你竟然敢戏弄我
[00:40.36]你疯了吗
[00:41.45]我不能让她怀上我的孩子 你不是我的真爱
[00:43.98]我不能让她怀上我的孩子 我行为卑鄙
[00:46.37]每天都要心碎几次 你说我还有救吗 
[00:48.78]你们都走开 给我一点空间 否则我就要开枪了
[00:51.98]//
[00:53.00]大家都从屋子里跑出去了
[00:54.62]//
[00:55.47]大家都在哀求我
[00:56.08]不要开枪
[00:57.07]小子 谁问你了
[00:59.35]你就是个乞丐 你哑巴了吗
[01:00.54]要尝尝我的枪子吗
[01:01.83]赶紧跑吧 小子 以后见着我躲开点
[01:04.28]小妞 你是不是眼巴巴盼着我宠幸你呢
[01:06.89]这是个陷阱 我知道你想方设法要怀上我的孩子
[01:09.18]枪就藏在我的裤裆里
[01:11.06]我的裤子里藏着30mm口径的枪呢 怎么能轻易脱下
[01:13.31]她给我打电话肯定是寂寞了
[01:15.99]我连通话记录都懒得看 我才不接呢
[01:18.40]你竟然敢戏弄我
[01:19.82]你疯了吗
[01:20.90]工装裤里揣着手枪 威力不亚于美国海军的导弹
[01:23.31]拿着汤普森冲锋枪对准他的脑袋 他只能跪地求饶
[01:25.64]天天都感觉心痛不已 你能不能救救我
[01:28.13]你竟然敢戏弄我
[01:29.67]她疯了吗
[01:30.76]小妞知道 我是最棒的 就像Tracy Mc Grady一样
[01:33.14]我知道 有380子弹防身就安全了
[01:35.59]我知道很多人都讨厌我 不过我可无所谓
[01:38.08]去你们的
[01:38.88]我开着迈巴赫横冲直撞 我要搞破坏了
[01:41.14]小子 你要是不懂我们 就赶紧坐下吧
[01:43.47]我听到有些人说 他们要开车撞我们
[01:46.07]开着兰博基尼跑车 把车窗摇下来
[01:48.47]//
[01:51.12]//
[01:53.67]//
[01:56.05]//
[01:56.76]//
